title: Login Success with Email and Password
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials and is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password for a registered user.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to their role-specific dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails when incorrect email and/or password are provided, displaying an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is rejected and an error message is displayed to the user.

title: Login with Google OAuth
description: Ensure users can log in successfully via the Google OAuth method and are sent to the correct dashboard per their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on 'Login with Google' button.
Complete Google OAuth consent and login flow.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the correct dashboard.

title: Login with Magic Link Functionality
description: Validate login flow via Magic Link sent to user email works properly and redirects to role-based dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Request Magic Link by entering registered email.
Verify Magic Link is sent to the user's email.
Click the Magic Link from email.
Verify user is logged in and redirected properly.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access application features and UI elements allowed for their assigned roles (Admin, Fisioterapeuta, Estagiário, Paciente).

steps.description: Log in as each type of user role.
Check accessible menu items, UI features and API endpoints are appropriate for that role.
Attempt to access unauthorized pages or functionalities.
Verify access is denied and error or redirect occurs.

title: Patient Record Creation with Valid CPF and Photo Upload
description: Verify that new patient records can be created with mandatory fields including valid CPF format, secure photo upload, and compliance with LGPD.

steps.description: Log in as Admin or Fisioterapeuta.
Navigate to patient management and initiate new patient creation.
Enter valid patient data including a correctly formatted CPF.
Upload a secure photo file for the patient.
Submit the new patient form.
Verify the patient record is created and visible in the list with correct details and stored securely.

title: Patient Record Creation with Invalid CPF Format
description: Verify that patient record creation is prevented if the CPF does not meet Brazilian validation rules and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Attempt to create a patient record with an invalid CPF format.
Verify error message is displayed preventing submission.

title: Edit Existing Patient Record and Update Photo
description: Ensure patient records can be edited by authorized users including updating photo, and changes are saved correctly.

steps.description: Log in as Admin or Fisioterapeuta.
Open an existing patient record for editing.
Change patient details and replace photo with a new secure file.
Save the changes.
Verify updates are persisted and displayed correctly.

title: Body Mapping Interactive Pain Point Registration
description: Verify users can interact with the SVG body map to add, edit, and remove pain points with correct severity on a scale from 0 to 10, and timeline updates accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as Fisioterapeuta.
Access an individual patient's body mapping interface.
Click on body regions to add pain points and set severity.
Edit and remove existing pain points.
Verify pain points are visually displayed with correct severity scale and the timeline of pain evolution reflects these changes.

title: Create Appointment with Conflict Prevention
description: Verify the appointment system prevents scheduling conflicts by validating the availability of both patient and professional before confirming booking.

steps.description: Log in as Fisioterapeuta.
Attempt to schedule a consultation overlapping an existing appointment for a patient or physiotherapist.
Confirm system blocks the conflict and shows an appropriate message.
Schedule an appointment in an available slot.
Verify appointment is created successfully and listed in calendar.

title: Appointment Waiting List and Notification Delivery
description: Verify that when all slots are taken, users can join a waiting list and receive notifications when a slot becomes available.

steps.description: Fill all slots for a target date.
Attempt to book additional appointment and join the waiting list.
Verify user is added to waiting list.
Cancel an existing appointment making a slot available.
Verify waiting list user receives notification and can book the freed slot.

title: Document Physiotherapy Session with Pain Level and Exercise Prescription
description: Verify that during session documentation users can record pain levels, procedures performed, prescribe exercises and schedule return visits properly.

steps.description: Log in as Fisioterapeuta.
Open an existing patient session or create a new one.
Input pain level using the defined scale.
Document procedures performed during the session.
Select and prescribe exercises from the library.
Schedule a return appointment if necessary.
Verify all data is saved and reflected in patient treatment records.

title: Exercise Library Search and Filtering
description: Verify the exercise library supports categorization by body region and exercise type, enables search, and filtering by difficulty levels.

steps.description: Access exercise library.
Search exercises by keyword.
Verify search results match query and display correct exercise metadata.
Filter exercises by body region and type.
Apply difficulty level filter.
Verify filtering works correctly and displays corresponding exercises.

title: Patient Portal Access to Prescribed Exercises and Adherence Reporting
description: Ensure patients can view exercises prescribed to them and provide feedback on exercise adherence via the portal with accurate reporting.

steps.description: Log in as Paciente.
Navigate to prescribed exercises section.
Verify list of prescribed exercises is accurate and includes video demos and instructions.
Submit adherence feedback for completed exercises.
Verify feedback is saved and reflected in adherence reports available to Fisioterapeuta.

title: Dashboards Display Correct Metrics by User Role
description: Verify that dashboards render accurate key performance indicators and metrics tailored for Admin, Fisioterapeuta, Estagiário, and Paciente roles.

steps.description: Log in as each user role.
Check dashboard displays relevant metrics and data corresponding to that role's scope and permissions.

title: Generate and Export Customized Clinical and Financial Reports
description: Verify reports are generated with accurate data, can be customized by filters, and exported correctly into PDF and other professional formats.

steps.description: Access reporting section as Admin or authorized user.
Configure report filters and parameters.
Generate clinical and financial reports.
Verify data accuracy in generated reports.
Export report in PDF format.
Confirm the export file is valid, complete, and professional in appearance.

title: Data Security and Encryption Compliance
description: Verify sensitive data including patient information is encrypted at rest and in transit complying with LGPD standards and audit logs are consistently generated.

steps.description: Review database records to confirm encryption of sensitive fields.
Transmit sensitive data and monitor encryption during network transit.
Trigger data access and modification actions.
Verify audit logs capture all critical data access and changes with time stamps and user identifiers.

title: UI Accessibility and Brazilian Market Compliance
description: Ensure UI components based on Radix UI and Tailwind CSS are accessible (keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes) and formatted per Brazilian localization standards.

steps.description: Inspect UI components for keyboard navigability.
Verify components have correct ARIA labels and roles.
Check input fields for CPF, currency, date use Brazilian formatting and validations.

title: Error Handling and User Feedback on API Failures
description: Simulate API failures and verify the system handles errors gracefully with user-friendly messages and logs errors appropriately.

steps.description: Trigger failure scenarios such as server errors or network interruptions when saving patient data or appointments.
Verify error notifications are displayed clearly to the user.
Verify error details are logged in the audit system for troubleshooting.

title: End-to-End Workflow: Scheduling, Session Documentation and Reporting
description: Test complete workflow from appointment scheduling, patient session documentation, updating pain mapping, prescribing exercises, to generating final reports.

steps.description: Schedule an appointment for a patient.
Perform session documentation including pain points and exercise prescription.
Update patient's pain timeline and verify historical records.
Generate clinical report including new session details.
Ensure all stages reflect correct and consistent data throughout the system.
